sentences.cn: “ 让我来, ” 那位警察殷勤地说.

sentences.en: a gallant attempt to save lives
Douglas was a complex man, thoughtful, gallant, and generous.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯让人捉摸不透，他体贴周到，对女孩子颇为殷勤，而且慷慨大方。

sentences.en: He was as ever assiduous and gallant.
sentences.cn: 他象以往一样殷勤周到,曲意温存.

sentences.en: He was so courteous, so gallant.
sentences.cn: 他这么彬彬有礼, 殷勤备至.

sentences.en: Huang Jiguang's gallant deed is known by all men.
sentences.cn: 黄继光的英勇事迹尽人皆知.

sentences.en: I had been promoted for what was called gallant and meritorious service.
sentences.cn: 我之所以得到提拔是由于立下了所谓的英勇卓越的功勋。

sentences.en: Many gallant actions and incredible feats of endurance are recorded.
sentences.cn: 许多英勇的行为和令人难以置信的坚韧不拔的业绩都已记录下来.

sentences.en: Many gave their lives in the gallant effort to wipe out rascism.
sentences.cn: 在消灭种族主义的英勇斗争中,许多人献出了生命.

sentences.en: She made a gallant attempt to hide her tears.
The gallant soldiers lost their lives so that peace might reign again.
sentences.cn: 英勇的战士们为恢复和平献出了生命。

sentences.en: The garden was made gallant with tulips.
sentences.cn: 花园里种着郁金香显得气派不凡.

sentences.en: The knight was a gallant fighter.
sentences.cn: 那位骑士是个勇敢的斗士.

sentences.en: The troops are in gallant array.
They are one of the most gallant peoples in the world.
sentences.cn: 他们是世界上最勇敢的民族之一.

sentences.en: This gallant speech was rewarded with a sweet, though a melancholy smile.
sentences.cn: 这一番恭维话博得了对方甜蜜然而苦涩的一笑.

words.tran_cn: 勇敢地；漂亮地；献殷勤地
勇敢；殷勤；风流；勇敢的行为
英勇的，勇敢的；华丽的；雄伟的

trans.tran_cn: 堂皇的，壮丽的，勇敢的，（对女子）献殷勤的
trans.tran_en: a man who is gallant is kind and polite towards women

trans.tran_cn: 时髦的青年男子，对妇女献殷勤的男人，情人
